description: VM Move action details sent to Slack

typeSpecificDetails.template:
{"blocks":[{"type":"header","text":{"type":"plain_text","text":":woman-running: $action.target.className $action.actionType Action :woman-running:","emoji":true}},{"type":"section","text":{"type":"mrkdwn","text":">- *Status*: #if( $action.actionState == "SUCCEEDED") :white_check_mark:#elseif ( $action.actionState == "READY") :hourglass:#elseif ( $action.actionState == "IN_PROGRESS") :construction:#else :x:#end `$action.actionState` via `$!action.actionMode EXECUTION` by `$!action.userName` at `$!action.updateTime`
>- *Details*: `$action.target.displayName` was moved from `$action.currentEntity.displayName` to `$action.newEntity.displayName`
>- *Reason*: `$action.risk.subCategory`
>- *Risk*: `$esc.json($action.risk.description)`"}},{"type":"actions","elements":[{"type":"button","text":{"type":"plain_text","text":":turbonomic: See Action in Turbo :turbonomic:","emoji":true},"value":"Click Here","url":"https://<YOUR_TURBO_URL>/app/#/view/main/$action.target.uuid/overview"}]}]}
